title.en: Moses: God Hears and Comes Down

en: God sees suffering and hears cries.
God sends a deliverer and reveals His name.

lines: Moses saw a bush burning without being consumed.
God called him and told him to remove his sandals.
God revealed His name and His faithfulness to His people.
God sent Moses to lead the people out of slavery.

question.en: What do you learn about God from the way He speaks to Moses?
